fields.title: Hard Magic Rules
fields.description: Clearly defined magical laws and mechanics.

fields.title: Forbidden Magic
fields.description: Magic that is dangerous, illegal, or taboo.

fields.title: Skill Leveling
fields.description: Characters gain new abilities and power-ups over time.

fields.title: Dungeons & Boss Battles
fields.description: The story features structured challenges with increasing difficulty.

fields.title: Heavenly Tribulation
fields.description: A powerful breakthrough comes with divine punishment.

fields.title: Immortal Ascension
fields.description: The ultimate goal is achieving godhood.

fields.title: Totalitarian Regime
fields.description: A government that controls all aspects of life.

fields.title: Underground Resistance
fields.description: A hidden group fights against oppression.

fields.title: Mind Games
fields.description: Characters engage in battles of intellect and manipulation.

fields.title: Unreliable Narrator
fields.description: The protagonist's perception of reality is distorted.

fields.title: Unspoken Feelings
fields.description: Characters struggle to confess their emotions.

fields.title: Mutual Pining
fields.description: Both love interests like each other but don't realize it.

fields.title: Resource Scarcity
fields.description: Food, water, or other essentials are extremely limited.

fields.title: Zombie Apocalypse
fields.description: The world is overrun by the undead.

fields.title: Anti-Hero Protagonist
fields.description: The main character has questionable morals.

fields.title: Eldritch Horror
fields.description: Creatures beyond human comprehension appear.

fields.title: Time Paradox
fields.description: Changing the past alters the future unexpectedly.

fields.title: Parallel Worlds
fields.description: Alternate realities exist alongside the main one.

fields.title: Nation Management
fields.description: The protagonist governs a land.

fields.title: Diplomatic Conflict
fields.description: Political struggles between kingdoms.
